item.title: What Does The Street Think About The CoreWeave, Nvidia Deal?
item.description: Jefferies said that Nvidia's support on land and powered shells should ease execution risk and help scaling, according to TheFly.

item.title: VanEck’s First and US’s Only Avalanche Spot ETF Debuts On Nasdaq
item.description: VanEck also said it has agreed to waive sponsor fees on VAVX for the first $500 million in its Assets Under Management (AUM)or until Feb 28, 2026.
